document_data.name: Bread Pudding
document_data.mainbody:
'''Bread pudding''' was a simple dessert from the cold lands of the [[Barony of Bloodstone]].
{{quote|''[[Laskar Malveen|Laskar]] is as honest as bread pudding, and twice as boring, if you ask me.''|[[Thamalon Uskevren II]]}}
document_data.Availability:
* [[Bread]] pudding was served in the [[Bloodstone Village]] of the Barony of Bloodstone in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]], where it was good enough food to be put on the Baron's table.
* In [[Sembia]], bread pudding was considered to be a simple and boring food.
